Save the Date - SelectUSA Mexico Road Show

Mérida, Mexico City, Tijuana

Tue, 05/12/2015 - Thu, 05/14/2015

Join the 2015 SelectUSA Road Show in Mexico!

This three-city Road Show to Merida, Mexico City and Tijuana will offer U.S. state, local and regional economic development organizations (EDOs) the opportunity to market their locations directly to potential investors. Each Road Show stop will feature a seminar **with sessions on how to invest in the United States. Along with scheduled **networking sessions, there will be ample opportunity for attendees to visit your **exhibit **at the event. 

More details are coming soon, but please save the date! For more information please contact: Rebecca.torres@trade.gov
